title: Start Annuity Annuitization
description: An annuity owner is retiring and wants to convert their deferred annuity into a stream of regular income payments.

tasks.description: Identify the contract holder and their annuity.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the customer and contract.

tasks.description: Calculate and present the different income payout options (e.g., life only, life with 10-year period certain).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear calculations for the various annuitization options.

tasks.description: Process the paperwork to start the annuitization based on the customer's chosen option.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully initiates the annuitization process.
